snippet: In a long-awaited memoir, Gen. Stanley A. McChrystal says disputes with the White House began at the beginning of President Obama’s first term.
abstract: Gen Stanley A McChrystal memoir My Share of the Task: A Memoir details tensions between Obama administration and Pentagon, which were evident from administration's opening months in office; book provides revealing glimpses of friction over military planning and comes as Pres Obama is weighing troop requests for Afghanistan conflict.
lead_paragraph: In a long-awaited memoir, Gen. Stanley A. McChrystal says disputes with the White House began at the beginning of President Obama’s first term.

headline.seo: McChrystal Book Details Tensions With Obama
headline.main: General Details Pentagon Tensions With Obama on Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: General Details Pentagon Tensions With Obama on Afghanistan

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
